TEXT.English: There are two paths for the magically inclined Dwarves in Luchuirp empire. Just as other empires train these magically gifted individuals as adepts or shamans, the Luchuirp opens a sophisticated Mage Guild dedicated to arcane research. But, unlike other empires, the Luchuirp also incorporated these gifted individuals in workshops and studios. There, they learn how to craft golem and infuse it with their magic power. By the end of their apprenticeship, these individuals become Luchuirp's famous Artificers. They can not cast any spells or provide aura support as their adept counterpart. But, they can enchant the golems, which has become Luchuirp's main army.
